charinfo.name: Akadou Yoroi
charinfo.description: A sound village genin that infiltrated Konoha as a spy, Yoroi is a capable, but brash ninja who likes to toy with his enemies. Yoroi is capable of absorbing the strength of his enemies, and make it his own in more than one way.

abilities.name: Empty Drain
abilities.description: Yoroi touches one enemy, stealing 20 health from them and lowering their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Yoroi will deal 5 more damage with all his skills.

abilities.name: Draining Assault
abilities.description: Yoroi charges at one enemy, attacking them with multiple energy drains, stealing 15 health from them each turn for 3 turns, lowering their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns and increasing the damage Yoroi deals with all his skills by 5 for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Chakra Focus
abilities.description: Yoroi endows his attacks. For 2 turns, if 'Energy Drain' or 'Draining Assault' are used, they will also steal 1 chakra for their duration.

abilities.name: Chakra Block
abilities.description: This skill makes Akadou Yoroi invulnerable for 1 turn.
